mapper.select: SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, b.state, b.skilled FROM errorwarehouse t ,point a,pointExerciseDetail b WHERE t.userId=#{userId} AND t.pointId= a.id AND t.pointId=b.pointId AND t.userId=b.userId AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.isRight=0 AND t.bookId=#{bookId} GROUP BY t.bookId,t.pointId ORDER BY b.skilled,a.sort,a.id,t.createTime ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseCycle=0 AND t.skilled=0 AND a.number>0 ORDER BY a.sort,a.id ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseCycle>0 AND t.skilled < 4
and a.chapterId in
#{id}
AND a.number>0 ORDER BY t.skilled,t.nextExerciseTime, a.sort,a.id ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state, t.skilled FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseCycle>0 AND t.skilled < 4 AND a.number>0 ORDER BY t.skilled,t.nextExerciseTime, a.sort,a.id ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseCycle>0 AND t.skilled =4
and a.chapterId in
#{id}
AND a.number>0 ORDER BY t.lastExerciseDate ASC

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state, t.skilled FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseCycle>0 AND t.skilled =4 AND a.number>0 ORDER BY t.lastExerciseDate ASC

select t.id,t.pointId ,b.pointName ,t.questionType,t.titleVoiceSrc,t.titleVoiceFlag,t.questionDescType,t.questionLongText,t.questionVoiceSrc, t.difficultyLevel,t.titleText,t.questionText,t.questionImages,t.answers from card t ,point b where t.pointId=b.id and t.pointId=#{pointId} AND b.number>0

SELECT a.id , a.pointName, a.sort, a.chapterId, a.chapterSort, a.number, a.bookId, t.state, t.skilled FROM pointExerciseDetail t ,point a WHERE t.pointId=a.id AND t.bookId=a.bookId AND t.userId=#{userId} AND t.bookId=#{bookId} AND t.exerciseCycle>0 AND a.number>0 ORDER BY t.skilled,t.nextExerciseTime, a.sort,a.id ASC
